title: Seth Meyers' Wife Gave Birth in Their Apartment Lobby | Jason Reynolds
description:
Seth Meyers tells the dramatic story of his second son's birth. (Originally aired April 9, 2017.)

Then, Seth talks to author Jason Reynolds talks about writing the Miles Morales Spider-Man novel, finding inspiration in incarcerated youth and how he was treated when he went shopping at Gucci in Italy.

Reynolds then goes backstage to continue the conversation with Late Night producer Sarah Jenks-Daly exclusively for this podcast.
